categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: GD-40-3 was a TIE pilot of the Galactic Empire.
In 1 ABY GD-40-3 was part of a TIE pilot unit that guarded a statue of Emperor Palpatine installed in front of the Theed Royal Palace on Naboo during that year's Empire Day celebrations.
GD-40-3 was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He made appearances during the Empire Day live events of 2009.
